channel.title: Aion on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in Aion on David Collantes

item.title: Aion, the WoW killer
item.description: Aion isn’t out yet for North America or Europe, but has already caused long time WoW players to quit. That is what my household has done, ending the life of two, four years old, accounts. Beta 4 is coming up, July 17th and we can hardly wait. Preorder will give you access to the beta, so go ahead! Simply Google Aion and follow the appropiated link. While we wait, it feels good to be out of WoW.
